enhanced_by.reason: The builder method initializes the predicate and collection state, which is necessary for setting up the environment before adding elements.
The validate method is invoked for each element in the collection being added, ensuring that the elements meet the predicate's criteria.
The rejectedElements method provides a way to verify which elements were rejected during the addAll operation, aiding in assertion construction.
